name: Blacktop Hoops by Vinci Games
headline: Take Two Interactive for VR games.
description:
Vinci Games is building Take Two Interactive for AAA VR games. We're building the next-generation ATT games for AR/VR. 

Blacktop Hoops is the ultimate VR basketball game and sports experience. Embark on a hoops journey in career mode, ball against bots, hang out with friends in online courts, or climb the rankings in competitive pickup games. Design your perfect avatar with millions of unique combinations. Do you have what it takes to become the GOAT? üêê

The company is led by CEO Nathan Ventura who led world-class developer programs at Oculus, Google, and Unity and CTO Maciej Szcze≈õnik who was the lead gameplay designer at CD Projekt Red for the award-winning Witcher series.

founders.name: Nathaniel Ventura, Founder
founders.description: Nathan Ventura is the co-founder and CEO of Vinci Games, which he started with Maciej Szcze≈õnik in 2021. Nathan oversees product, marketing, and business development for the company. He spent his career leading world-class developer programs at Facebook, Google, and Unity. Currently he is focused on building the next generation of AAA competitive sports for virtual reality with Blacktop Hoops.

founders.name: Maciej Szcze≈õnik, Founder
founders.description: Maciej Szcze≈õnik is the co-founder and CTO of Vinci Games. He is responsible for game design and development. He studied physics (BSc) and computer science (MSc) and started his game dev career in 2004. Former lead gameplay designer on The Witcher 1, 2, and 3 at CD Projekt Red and Lead Designer at 11 Bit Studios. Former Vice-Rector and author of Video Game Development course at Warsaw Film School. Maciej started working on VR games and apps in 2015. Won Unity Neon Challenge in 2018.

# Ball out in the highest rated VR basketball game on Meta Quest
[ JOIN DISCORD ](https://blacktophoopsvr.com/<https:/discord.gg/5YZMBhN2c2>)
[ BUY ON QUEST ](https://blacktophoopsvr.com/<https:/bit.ly/Website-BTH-FallSale>)
[ BUY ON STEAM ](https://blacktophoopsvr.com/<https:/store.steampowered.com/app/1945250/Blacktop_Hoops/>)
**Blacktop Hoops is the ultimate VR basketball game. Embark on a hoops journey in career mode, ball against bots, hang with friends in online courts, or climb the rankings in competitive pickup games. Do you have what it takes to become the GOAT? üêê**
[ SIGN UP TO PLAYTEST ](https://blacktophoopsvr.com/<https:/xgv96tx72qz.typeform.com/to/gk43rcHR>)
## Sign up to our newsletter and stay up-to-date on new features and content
Sign up with your email address to receive news and updates.
First Name
Last Name
Email Address
Sign Up
We respect your privacy.
Thank you for sharing!
Ball out in 1-on-1 VR streetball
  * ## DRIBBLE
Pull off buttery smooth crossovers and break ankles with our groundbreaking dribble system.
  * ## SHOOT
Knock down threes, fadeways, stepbacks, and floaters with intuitive shooting mechanics. 
  * ## DUNK
Elevate and posterize opponents with devastating high-flying dunks. 
  * ## DYNAMIC AI
Play against challenging AI opponents with responsive offense and defense driven by mocap animations. 


## Collect Drip
Unlock new kicks, apparel, effects, and more. 
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e75ce72d07e033dfa44550/1bc5c615-03b4-476a-ab12-5f3242c64dd3/snk1.gif)
### Vinci Flight 1
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e75ce72d07e033dfa44550/36650040-6f73-4f4f-9f67-92d9fd8fe3ff/snk2.gif)
### Vinci Berzerks
## Natural Mechanics
Designed with the most natural and immersive basketball mechanics in virtual reality. 
**Drain** jumpers like the chef. 
**Crossover** scrubs like the uncle. 
**Dunk** on fools like the king.

generated_description:
**Blacktop Hoops by Vinci Games: Your Gateway to the Ultimate VR Basketball Experience**

Founded in 2021, Blacktop Hoops is revolutionizing the virtual reality gaming scene with its engaging and immersive basketball experience. Hailing from Berkeley, CA, the company is packed with industry talent, led by CEO Nathan Ventura‚Äîwho has an impressive background with Oculus, Google, and Unity‚Äîand CTO Maciej Szcze≈õnik, known for his work on the critically acclaimed Witcher series at CD Projekt Red. 

At its core, Blacktop Hoops aims to provide players with a next-generation basketball experience that merges the excitement of sports with the limitless possibilities of AR/VR technology. Their mission aligns seamlessly with the vision of Take Two Interactive, making their mark in the AAA VR gaming space.

What can you expect from Blacktop Hoops? Picture this: a vibrant virtual basketball court where you can embark on a career mode, challenge bots, connect with friends in online courts, or dive into competitive pickup games. Create your unique avatar with millions of customization options and see if you have what it takes to become the Greatest of All Time (GOAT). üêê

The gameplay mechanics are designed to provide a realistic and dynamic experience. Whether you‚Äôre executing buttery smooth crossovers, sinking threes, or pulling off high-flying dunks, every movement is crafted for natural feel and responsiveness. The AI opponents you face are no pushovers; they adapt to your play style, offering a challenging experience.

With a passionate team of seven and strong backing from Y Combinator's Batch S22, Blacktop Hoops is carving its niche in the gaming landscape. They're tagged under categories like 'virtual-reality', 'consumer', 'gaming', and 'metaverse', reflecting their innovative spirit and commitment to capturing the essence of basketball.

To stay updated on their latest features or to sign up for playtesting, you can find them at [blacktophoopsvr.com](https://blacktophoopsvr.com/). If you're a basketball fan and love VR, Blacktop Hoops might just be the game you've been waiting for.
